# DataProviderState.paused

**Case**

The data provider is paused.

## Declaration

```swift
case paused
```

## Getting the state of a data provider

- **DataProviderState.initialized**: The data provider has been created.
- **DataProviderState.running**: The data provider is running.
- **DataProviderState.stopped**: The data provider is stopped.

items.description: The data provider has been created.
